Package dao

Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
dao.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - represents the chosen type of Model class - Client, Product, WarehouseOrder.
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class implementing methods used in "communicating" with the database: create, insert, find / select, delete, etc.. - dynamically generates the SQL queries, all that through reflection.

  • Method Details

    • findByField

      public T findByField​(java.lang.Object field, java.lang.String fieldName)
      Finds the first row / object of type T that meets the condition of fieldName = field in the corresponding table of the database.
      Parameters:
      field - is the value for filtering tha data
      fieldName - is the name of the table column where we expect to find the occurrence.
      Returns:
      the first row / object of type T that meets the condition / null if nothing of that nature was found.

    • insert

      public int insert​(T item)
      Inserts the item given as a parameter into its corresponding database table.
      Parameters:
      item - is the item to be inserted.
      Returns:
      an integer value to signal the kind of error / exception that might have occurred.

    • findAll

      public java.util.List<T> findAll()
      Returns all the objects of the type T in the corresponding table.
      Returns:
      a list of T-type objects from the database.

    • delete

      public void delete​(java.lang.Object field, java.lang.String fieldName)
      Deletes all rows in the table where the condition of fieldName = field is met.
      Parameters:
      field - is the value for filtering tha data.
      fieldName - is the name of the table column where we expect the values of field to be.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
